snippet.title: Planet Coaster 2 | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Create a coaster and water park paradise in Planet Coaster 2: build and customise thrilling roller coasters and incredible water slides, manage the ultimate theme park experience, and share your incredible creations.  

🎢 Design epic coasters and rides!  
🌊 All new water attractions –  welcome pools, flumes and more!  
🎡 New tools for expanded management 
🌲 New themes and scenery – customise everything! 
🤝Build parks with other players – one park manager at a time 

Are you ready to create a splash? 

#PlanetCoaster2 #CreateASplash #FrontierDevelopments #Xbox #PlayStation #PCGaming #Games #Gaming #GameTrailers 

For more news and information about Planet Coaster 2:  

Website: https://fron.dev/YT-PC2-Announce
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@planetgamesofficial
Facebook: https://facebook.com/PlanetCoaster
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlanetCoaster
Instagram: https://instagram.com/PlanetCoaster
